description:
The Akudarma Trio heads to 19th century France in order to find Napoleon, who had taken over most of Europe. They had heard he was too busy even to sleep, but then they hear humming. They end up finding Napoleon relaxing in the tub! Not only that, he actually loves sleeping! He even promises them the Dynamond if they can figure out a way for him to get a good night’s sleep. And then Tokio and Calen show up! Who will be able to reward Napoleon with the best night’s sleep?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 3 Jikan shika Nenai to Iu Napoleon mo Bikkuri Dokkuri na Anminhou to wa!?
3時間しか寝ないというナポレオンもビックリドッキリな安眠法とは!?
What Was Napoleon`s Super Surprising Method of Getting a Good Night`s Sleep When He Supposedly Only Slept 3 Hours?!
